<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c8cd2b34d1027c93fbca90f3cdc8123fe22dfa25|patch 8.2.0677: Vim9: no support for closures>
patch 8.2.0677: Vim9: no support for closures

Problem:    Vim9: no support for closures.
Solution:   Find variables in the outer function scope, so long as the scope
            exists.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0677: Vim9: no support for closures 路 vim/vim@c8cd2b3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0677: Vim9: no support for closures 路 vim/vim@c8cd2b3
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no support for closures. Solution: Find variables in the outer function scope, so long as the scope exists.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d58a662f44dc11475f4cf5922a948635da934cc4|patch 8.2.0678: rare crash for popup menu>
patch 8.2.0678: rare crash for popup menu

Problem:    Rare crash for popup menu.
Solution:   Check for NULL pointer. (Nobuhiro Takasaki, closes #6027)
